name: Ma'Shalled

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally ATK in Dungeons by 34%.

skills.name: Bloodsucker
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Heals this Champion by 30% of the damage inflicted.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%

skills.name: Tornado
skills.raw_description:
Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff and a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff on the target for 2 turns. Grants this Champion an Extra Turn.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Open Wounds
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns. Inflicts 50% more damage against targets under buffs.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1
